toolbox_jason module¶

toolbox_jason.average_heart_rate(heart_rate_list)¶

calc the average of heart rate

Parameters:heart_rate_list – list contains the measured heart rates
Returns:the average
toolbox_jason.validate_heart_rate_request(age, heart_rate)¶

determine whether there is abnormal of the heart rate

1–2 years: Tachycardia >151 bpm 3–4 years: Tachycardia >137 bpm 5–7 years: Tachycardia >133 bpm 8–11 years: Tachycardia >130 bpm 12–15 years: Tachycardia >119 bpm >15 years – adult: Tachycardia >100 bpm

Parameters:
  • age – the age of people, an factor in consideration of Tachycardia
  • heart_rate – the last measured heart rate
Returns:

status in the range [‘Tachycardia’, ‘Normal’, ‘Undefined’]
toolbox_jason.validate_json_data_entry(request_json, entry_dict)¶

check if the request json data has the expected entry and the expected type

Parameters:
  • request_json – json data to check
  • entry_dict – dictionary has the format {entry:example_data}
Returns:

heart_rate_sentinel_server
